[Page Title: Menus - The Woodruff]

Skip to content 
Menus

Food

Small plates, carefully selected meats & cheeses, creative entrees, and desserts await you here at the Woodruff. Explore the menu below.
View Full Menu 
Cocktails

Our cocktail lineup is dreamy, and we have something to satisfy anyone's thirst.
View Full Menu 
Wine

You'll find an extension collection of wines by the glass, plus bottles, bubbles, and rose. Find the perfect pairing to go with our delicious eats.
View Full Menu 
Beer & Whiskey

An amazing selection of local and seasonal beers and ciders with the finest whiskey selections in Johns Island.
View Full Menu

[Page Title: The Woodruff]

Skip to content 
Welcome to the Woodruff

Creative Plates, Diverse Wines & Clever Cocktails

Welcome to The Woodruff, a cozy little wine and cocktail bar in Johns Island, SC where we've curated a menu of small, fun-share plates, an extensive variety of cheese and charcuterie choices, and a menu of unique entrees. You'll find a vast collection of wines by the glass, plus bottles, bubbles, cocktails, and rose. at Live Oak Square today.
Visit us 
About us

Our Menus

Food

Small plates, carefully selected meats & cheeses, creative entrees, and desserts await you here at the Woodruff. Explore the menu below.
View Full Menu

Our cocktail lineup is dreamy, and we have something to satisfy anyone's thirst.
View Full Menu 
Wine

You'll find an extension collection of wines by the glass, plus bottles, bubbles, and rose. Find the perfect pairing to go with our delicious eats.
View Full Menu 
Beer & Whiskey

An amazing selection of local and seasonal beers and ciders with the finest whiskey selections in Johns Island.
View Full Menu 
The Woodruff Wine Bar

REVIEWS

Great little spot on John’s Island! Everything was delicious, the wine & cocktails were great, and the staff was very attentive.
Lauren Paige Butler 
Absolutely amazing. The food, the atmosphere, the music, the conversation, everything. Highly, highly recommend. And, please, whatever you do, GET THE SOFT PRETZELS - they will change your life
Billy Carson 
Excellent addition to Johns Island! The charcuterie options and small plates are awesome. The Woodruff has a great wine selection and full cocktail bar too!
Ashley Logan
